entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning late in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h then light late in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
